      • triggerIfCanceled

        @NotNull
public OnChatTrigger triggerIfCanceled(boolean bool)

        Sets if the chat trigger should run if the chat event has already been canceled. True by default.

        Parameters:
        bool - Boolean to set
        Returns:
        the trigger object for method chaining

      • setChatCriteria

        @NotNull
public OnChatTrigger setChatCriteria(@NotNull
                                              java.lang.Object chatCriteria)

        Sets the chat criteria for matchesChatCriteria. Arguments for the trigger's method can be passed in using ${variable}. Example: OnChatTrigger.setChatCriteria("<${name}> ${message}"); Use ${*} to match a chat message but ignore the pass through.

        Parameters:
        chatCriteria - the chat criteria to set
        Returns:
        the trigger object for method chaining
